Package DAO

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
DAO.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the entity type
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T> extends Object
The AbstractDAO class provides common methods for data access objects (DAOs). It uses generics to support CRUD operations for any entity type.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractDAO

      public AbstractDAO()
      Constructs a new instance of the AbstractDAO class. It determines the entity type based on the generic parameter of the concrete subclass.

    • update

      public void update(String object, String field, String fieldValue, int id) throws SQLException, IntrospectionException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      Updates a row in the database table.
      Parameters:
      object - The name of the table to update.
      field - The field to update.
      fieldValue - The new value for the field.
      id - The ID of the row to update.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      IntrospectionException - If an introspection exception occurs.
      InvocationTargetException - If an invocation target exception occurs.
      IllegalAccessException - If an illegal access exception occurs.

    • delete

      public T delete(T t, int id) throws SQLException, IntrospectionException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      Deletes a row from the database table.
      Parameters:
      t - The object representing the table.
      id - The ID of the row to delete.
      Returns:
      The deleted object.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      IntrospectionException - If an introspection exception occurs.
      InvocationTargetException - If an invocation target exception occurs.
      IllegalAccessException - If an illegal access exception occurs.
